title: Restricted my account for no reason, haven‚Äôt been able to work in DAY
text: I‚Äôve filed an appeal, deleted content, sent emails, etc. to no avail. Instagram randomly restricted my account because I used the word  ‚ÄúEDM‚Äù in my bio, for months, but they just caught on and apparently are biased towards people who work in the dance music industry. Not only that, but my Instagram is my JOB. By restricting my account and not lifting these restrictions in 24 hours like they said they would, they are actively MAKING ME LOSE INCOME. I have been taking DAYS off work waiting for this issue to resolve, and have been ignored and neglected by the Instagram team. Instagram in 2024 isn‚Äôt it fam.

title: Scary New Reels Feature
text: The fact that no one is talking about the new reel feature that automatically scrolls to the next reel for you is concerning. This is the definition of being spoon fed; new information is going to be thrown at you CONSTANTLY.
